Well, the end of someone is life is usually a pretty sudden curtain call.
It is probably normal to die without being able to say goodbye.
It may seem like I am talking as though I know everything, but...
Please, do not let him get to you!
Mr. Avdol told you not to fight by yourself!
You wanted to get revenge, even if it meant dying with your enemy.
Mr. Avdol followed you because that worried him, and this is what happened!
So what am I supposed to do?
We need to fall back for now.
Avdol was cruelly stabbed in the back.
My sister was killed without resistance.
You want me to hold these regrets inside and run away?!
Do not fight them when we do not even know how their Stands work yet!
Do not fight a battle that will kill you!
That is what Mr. Avdol was trying to tell you.
We are going to use that truck to get out of here.
Y-You are telling me to hold it in?

I think that means you owe him.

He might not have died, if not for you.
But there is no need to be sad.
Since you will be together again soon.
You will die, and then you can be with those two fools in the next world.
Your little sister was really cute, Polnareff...
Once you are reunited with your sister, you should ask her
about exactly how I killed her!
Polnareff, do not let him provoke you!
Your Chariot cannot cut my Hanged Man.
Your Stand cannot enter a mirror.
Let us put an end to this idiot.
That is out of my Stand's range.
Even if I hit him from here,
the bullet would not hit with much force.
Mr. Centerfold went after them, eh?
He must really want to finish off Polnareff.
I thought I did not care if I died, so long as I could avenge my sister.
I will not let his feelings go to waste.
I will fight to keep living.
Take this instead of a handshake as proof that we have made up, Polnareff.
When they come after us again, we will defeat them together.
At that moment, I am sure that I stabbed him with the sword.
But my strike did not land.
his Stand, Hanged Man, still attacked from the shards.
He will attack my reflection from within the mirror.
My Stand cannot go inside a mirror...
How am I supposed to attack him if he is in some kind of mirror world?
inside the mirror and the mirror world,
but there is no world inside a mirror.
This is not some fantasy or fairy tale.
You saw it, too, did not you?!
You can only see him in a mirror, and when you turn around, he is not there.
But what you see in a mirror is just a reflection created by light.
You do not have to tell me that!
I am talking about what is going on right now.
If there are such things as Stands, there could be a mirror world, too!
I think that fact is what will let us solve the mystery of Hanged Man.
If Stands can defeat other Stands,
then there is still something we do not know about his
He is inside the plating on the steering wheel!
He is caught up to us!
I-I hit my chest, but I am fine.
Get away from anything that is reflective!
He is going from mirror to mirror!
He moves by jumping from one reflective surface to another!
That means he is actually light!
The true nature of his Stand is light?
He was just in the car's bumper!
He is going to reflect off of the car's bumper and into something else.
Do not go near anything that is reflective.
And take anything off your body that reflects!
Take off the buttons on your uniform!
Want me to bring some medicine or something?
It is dangerous, so get out of here!
Hey, your car's totally messed up...
He is in the kid's eye!
I told you not to look at us!
Stop following me with your eyes!
What are you going to do?
You would not stab this cute little kid's eye out
with that sword of yours, would you, Polnareff?
Not unless you stab the kid's eye out.
You do not say things like that in this kind of situation.
you have got to say something more like this before you get your revenge.
My name is Jean Pierre Polnareff.
For my sister's honor, and so that my friend Avdol can rest in peace...
I am going to hurl you
into the depths of despair, Centerfold!
I will buy you a caramel later!
There is sand in my eye!
P-Polnareff, he is in your eye...
I do not really understand the principle,
but he essentially moves at the speed of light.
A speed that you would not normally be able to see.
But I knew that if the kid closed his eyes,
the next place he would move to would be my own eye.
Hanged Man can only exist within the world of reflections.
When one world is about to be destroyed,
he has to move to something else that is reflective.
As long as I can read his trajectory, he will be easy to cut with a sword.
His real body is over there!
My name is Jean Pierre Polnareff,
and I have seen through your Stand's secret.
It is a Stand of light that moves at incredible speed.
There is no way I can catch it.
But if I know where it is going to go,
and I slash its trajectory in that moment,
If Kakyoin and Avdol had not shown up,
I probably would not have figured that out and you would have killed me.
He is not the man with two right hands!
He is just a drifter that happened to be in town.
I just used a knife to give him the same wound I have.
without knowing what I looked like was a big mistake!
Take a good look around you.
These guys say they will give you money!
They will give us money for nothing!
Have you figured out what is going on?
You say you have seen through my Stand?
I have known about my Stand's weakness for quite some time.
If there are lots of reflective surfaces so you cannot find its trajectory,
What are you going to do?
You sacrificed your youth to hunt me down...
And you are going to fail before you finish?!
Talk about a lonely, boring life.
Meanwhile I, Centerfold, will continue to have cute girls
like your sister all around me, and live a fun, happy life!

Polnareff, that is not what you say here.

and so that the soul of my friend Polnareff's sister may rest in peace,
I will have you pay with your life.
I will give this gold coin to whoever picks it up.
It is so shiny, you can see your face in it!
Looks like all of their eyes are focused on one point now.
We know the trajectory that Hanged Man will have to take!
Looks like you are the one who is really good at sobbing, Centerfold!
Well, you are about to fall to Hell, sobbing the whole way down.
But there is one thing I cannot rely on the guardians of Hell to do for me.
To turn you into a pincushion!
I have been waiting years for this moment!
I will leave the rest to King Yama.
So this is the true Hanged Man...
He was rotten to the core.
I finally caught up with you guys.
Why are you walking so slow?
If you are going to run, run like your lives depend on it.
So act like this is the end and come at us!
Show us what you have got, damn it!
Hey, are you listening, Mr. Centerfold?!
I do not think he is listening anymore.
He is rather busy right now...
Since he is being sentenced in Hell!
Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey!
Do not try to pull that nonsense!
Bluffing will not work on me!
There is no way you can beat him!
Even I do not stand a chance against the invincible Hanged Man!
That piece of shit's body is about two or three thousand meters that way.
I-I do not stand a chance!
I am at a total disadvantage by myself!
I will run for now and wait for the next opportunity!
I am the type whose power only shows when I am paired with someone else.
That is Hol Horse's philosophy of life!
Though it was a simple funeral, his body's been buried.
The one who stabbed Mr. Avdol in the back was the man with two right hands,
but the because of death was Hol Horse's bullet.
What shall we do with him?
I will give him his sentence.
I do not know what is going on,
but I am always thinking of you!
That is my reason to live!
Do not let Hol Horse get away!
I will gladly accept your feelings and keep on living!
I am running away because I love you, baby!
Do not ah me, you bitch!
Polnareff, that woman was just another one he was using.
And he no longer had any intention of fighting.
We have no time to deal with him.
But we have to hurry ahead.
It is already been fifteen days since we left Japan.
Well, I guess it cannot be helped.
Let us resume our trip to Egypt.
In order to defeat Dio, our hearts have to be as one.
We cannot go off on our own!
That is when he will come after us.
Let us get a move on!
The city of Varanasi is coming into view.
Hey... does not that sort of look like a person's face?
